titlePart.text: SECTION A HUMAN NECESSITIES
HEALTH AND AMUSEMENT
LIFE-SAVING
FIRE-FIGHTING
FIRE-FIGHTING
titlePart.entryReference: fire-extinguishing compositions, use of chemical substances in extinguishing fires
spraying, applying liquids or other fluent materials to surfaces in general

titlePart.text: Fire-extinguishing methods
Methods of preventing, or preventing the spread of, fires
Methods of extinguishing or preventing the spread of fire

by use of steam
by use of sprayed or atomised water

by use of foam

by the use of fire-proof curtains
by cutting off inflammable gas or liquid in case of leakage or fire
